colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B (CES MA CIG MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN BRGYUD KYI LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR SHIN TU 'KHYER BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA BYAMS PA 'PHRIN LAS DAR RGYAS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS MED SNYOMS LAS CAN BYAMS PA LHA DBANG RIG 'DZIN GYIS RANG NYID KHA DON DU BYA BA'I CHED DU SHIN TU MYUR BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,RGYUN GGYI NYAMS LEN LA DKAR 'GYED THOR 'BUL MA BYAS RJES, ,KHRA 'GYED DMAR 'GYED BZHAG NAS, STONG GSUM NAM MKHA' KHYAB PA'I 'JIG RTEN NA, ,ZHES PA MAN CHAD BYAS KYANG CHOG LAGS, ,LAM ZAB RGYUN GYIS RNAL 'BYOR 'DI NYID KYI LUNG 'KHRID GZHUNG KHUNGS RNAMS RJE BLA MA BYAMS PA LHA DBANG RIG 'DZIN @023A *, ,GYI MDZAD PAS GZHIR BZHAG LA, PHAt KYI DMIGS RIM RNAMS ZHAL SHES SU BSTZAL PA BKOD CING MTHING RTAGS KYI PHYE BA RNAMS CUNG ZAD SPROS, ,ZAB DON SNYAN BRGYUD ZAB LAM CHEN MO SOGS GCOD GZHUNG NAS KHA SKONGS LHAN THABS KYI TSUL DU GNYAN KHROD PA NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS KYIS BKOD PA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,)
